tutorial: การใช้งานเบื้องต้น
tutorialBasic: It's simple. The number on a square shows the number of mines adjacent to it. The objective is to find and flag all the mines. If you tap on a mine, it explodes.
tutorialText1: If a number is touching the same number of squares, then the squares are all mines.
tutorialText2: After marking your first flag, review the numbers and analyze the next square.
tutorialText3: If a square has the same number of flags, all other remaining squares adjacent to it aren't mines (the green arrow).
tutorialText4: Review the numbers and keep opening squares.
